ssGUI::​TargetShape
struct
ssGUI::​TargetShape
Variables
ShapeIndex
int ShapeIndex

The index of specified shape, relative to the first shape of the GUI Object.  0 will mean the first shape created by the GUI Object, -1 will mean this field is not used instead.  See ssGUI::Renderer::Extension_GetGUIObjectFirstShapeIndex for more details of the first shape.

ShapeName
std::string ShapeName

The name of the specified shape, empty if this field is not used.
